title: tArAi un pEraruLai
sahitya:
tArAi un pEraruLai OrAru mukhattayyE


anupallavi

  sIrAi unnaDiyArin tIrAp-piNi pOkkum IrAru karattuDanE sIrOngi sirappOnE


caraNam    pArODu aNDamellAm padarik-kadara ANDu sIrAna neri tavarina sUranin serukkozhiya
kUrAna vElAlavanaik-kUru sheida mA vIranE mArAda krpai unadai kOrum ippEdai sOrAdu
